metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2520 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3.2 is affected. macOS before 10.12.5 is affected. tvOS before 10.2.1 is affected. watchOS before 3.2.2 is affected. The issue involves the "SQLite" component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (buffer overflow and application crash) via a crafted SQL statement.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-2520` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-0 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
sqlite3 - 3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-1ubuntu1.2').
